Welcome to the Docker Weekly, a newsletter with the latest content on Docker and the agenda for the upcoming weeks.

Submit your talk for DockerCon Europe 2015

Using Docker in an interesting way? We’re looking for a variety of talks for DockerCon Europe 2015 including cool and unique use cases, advanced technical talks and how using Docker is changing your dev, ops and DevOps processes and challenges! Submit by September 1st, 2015

Learn Docker Online!

New to Docker? Join us for our Introduction to Docker webinar on Wednesday, July 22nd at 10:00 am PDT for an introduction the Docker technology including how it works, the benefits and key use cases for deploying Docker in your application environment.

Looking for a more advanced talk? Jana Radhakrishnan, Lead Software Engineer at Docker, will be doing a deep dive into Docker Networking with additional demos and insights on the product roadmap in our next Docker Online Meetup on Thursday, July 16 at 10:00 am PDT.

And don’t forget to try our Docker Subscription for Server free for 30 days! Just sign up with your Docker hub credentials and get your trial licenses.
